title: Shadow's Awakening: The Legends of Kalanar Series
description: Perfect for fans of high fantasy, this epic novel is impossible to put down!Valthorn Amakiir, the blind son of a noble, and Orion Xilra, the son of a servant, are born on the same day and become fast friends. The pair quickly discover that the world outside the manor is ladened with wonders and are thrown from their quiet lives in the village of Ravedore into the wider world of magic and mystery. The kingdoms of Kalanar enjoyed a time of utter peace, but it was to be short lived.Between a psychotic cult and ancient magic reappearing in the world, the boys must quickly learn to adapt and prepare for what is to come. Together they must take on the destiny that fate determined for them, gathering friends and allies from sometimes unlikely places along the way.Dive into a land of magic in this first instalment of the Legends of Kalanar. Follow the stories of the most renowned and beloved heroes Kalanar has ever known in their struggle to save their home.If you enjoy the fantasy realms of Brandon Sanderson, Guy Gavriel Kay, or George R.R. Martin you won't be able to put down the compulsively addictive Liam S. Bonner’s novel Shadow’s Awakening.Shadow’s Awakening is a fast-paced epic story that builds page by page to an exciting conclusion that is bound to become a favourite for every fantasy lover.
author: Liam Bonner
